data.title: Cliff Korman during the process of constructing the Paulo Moura Archive. Interviewed by Halina Grynberg
data.text:
This corner is dedicated to places of the web to travel to. Every now and then, I'll post a new destination. Also visit my map of places in the classroom section of this site.

The Instituto Paulo Moura opened in 2012 under the stewardship of Halina Grynberg and is a treasure trove of music, images and stories of one of Brazil's most beloved artists: www.institutopaulomoura.com.br
